website_summaries.verdict: An attractive headboard-only design with five built-in cubbyholes for storage.
pros: Brackets secure the headboard to a standard metal bed frame
A discreet cord hole makes it easy to plug in alarm clocks and phones
Four of the shelves adjust in height
cons: The headboard is made from engineered rather than solid wood, and some owners report struggling with the assembly process

customer_reviews.title: Cat tested, human approved.
customer_reviews.text: We have a cat that likes to knock everything off of our nightstands & walk back & forth across our heads all night. Enter this life saver! It went together easily enough & attached to the bed frame just fine. Now our cat leaves our nightstands alone & just hangs out on the shelf at night. Another one of our cats discovered the fancy new headboard & started sleeping in big cubby hole in the middle. It's serving its purpose well.
customer_reviews.author: Neonlexicon

customer_reviews.title: Quality furniture
customer_reviews.text: Having a basic aptitude with tools and mechanics is pretty necessary for this project. It's not that difficult really, but cumbersome and tedious. I can imagine doing this without a drill or electric screwdriver, as there are a lot of screws. This package is very heavy, I brought it upstairs in pieces. The weight, though, adds to the quality of this furniture. There is nothing cheap feeling about it, it is very solid and sturdy. While that makes maneuvering the parts harder, it makes for furniture I feel will last, despite the fact that I put it together.
customer_reviews.author: JDDPTA

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: For the money, this is an amazing headboard and I love it! Pretty easy to put together and very stable, I have had it for a couple of months now and I still can't believe how cheap it was to purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy.
customer_reviews.text: I hate writing a bad review but have to leave one. The instructions are rather hard to figure out and took me a while to follow them. The pieces are warped and don't fit together good, but I was hoping that it would come together nicely before I got to the final part of the assembly however that was not the case you can see all defaults and the poor connections in the furniture. At this point I feel this has been my worse purchase I've ever made from Amazon. I have the entire thing together and not happy with how it looks. Look at the pictures and you will see the pieces of pressed wood do not even match.
customer_reviews.author: David K

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: easy to assemble. My friends helped me with that. And looks pretty good. The storages can be adjusted by the height.
customer_reviews.author: elfie wong

customer_reviews.title: A really bad headboard
customer_reviews.text: I feel like I have generally had success with Sauder products. This one doesn’t hold true to that. The packaging was excellent. The instructions are very clear. The included hardware wasn’t missing anything and includes a few extras. The toggle locks are incredibly vague and provide almost no hold. This causes problems for the entire structure. After having it nearly entirely built (just short of starting to nail the back into place) the whole thing collapsed. It didn’t feel great landing on my feet. I should’ve spent a little more money on a better product.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Pantoja

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price.  Color is not as golden as photos.
customer_reviews.text: For some reason bookcase headboards in oak'ish color seem difficult to find. This was a smoking price for something that will do the trick. The color was not as golden as pictured so I wonder if they've changed finishes as the time goes by. Fit and finish were good and it looks nicer than the cost would indicate. Assembly took longer than expected and I'm middle of the road handy. Since it's particle board with veneer it's heavier than solid wood furniture but not unmanageable. Be sure to point the drilled holes on the uprights towards the outside. It'll work until I can make one out of oak plywood.
customer_reviews.author: BooksRuleAZ

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy headboard, inaccurate color.
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and good looking. The instructions were clear and all the pieces clearly marked. It did take two of us to put together but a stronger single person could do it alone. (I'm n my 70s). My only complaint is that the color shown on line was much lighter than the actual piece. Luckily, my other furniture in that room is already mixed otherwise I would have sent it back. The reason I chose this headboard was the bookcase like features. I am 100%pleased with the convenience of the shelves and the cord openings on the back.
customer_reviews.author: NBlover

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: If I had the chance I'd probably not buy it again. It barely stands on its own and feels like its going to fall down any minute - though it's acceptable with a bed in front of it. The material is cheap (as you'd expect) and slightly warped (maybe during shipping) so that some parts clearly don't line up perfectly. Instructions could be improved, I put in the vertical piece holding the shelves the wrong way the first time, so make sure you follow everything to a T and double check your work. Overall it serves its purpose so I'd say it's satisfactory.
customer_reviews.author: BlackKnight

customer_reviews.title: Sauder is always a good buy.
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend Sauder as a company. The pieces match perfectly, and look more expensive than they actually were. The instructions are very user friendly with words as well as pictures to ensure you do it correctly. I was worried that the headboard was too short for my platform mattress base, but it is the perfect height. I wasn't sure I would like the bookcase headboard, but I have come to really love it. Great for extra storage in a small room, incase you don't have room for a nightstand. Great furniture, and great company to do business with all around.
customer_reviews.author: K. B.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and attractive, slight issue with assembly
customer_reviews.text: This headboard is pretty, useful, and quite sturdy for something you assemble yourself. Unfortunately it turns out my full-size metal bedframe is not "standard," so it will not attach to my bed. I've left it unattached and just butted my bed up against it, and this is working well for me so far. One note: for some reason, the instructions want you to start attaching heavy boards to the light under-top-piece molding strip early in the process. This caused my molding to come apart and almost ruined the project. It was much easier (after damage control!) to put most of the heavier pieces together and then screw the molding to the top as one of the final steps.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Baiocchi

customer_reviews.title: Missing nails and screws plsu bad instrustions
customer_reviews.text: There were missing screws and mails and that was probably due to the bag originally containing them being torn. The shipping box showed no damage, therefore the bag was most likely in that torn condition when the parts were assembled in the shipping box. Also the the assembly instructions were probably written by someone who hadn't put together this headboard/bookcase. Half way through the assembly with bloody hands, I threw out the instructions and proceeded on my own. After a day's labor it turned out fine. I've put together Ikea products and have made my own bookcases from stretch. If it weren't for the missing parts and bad instructions, I would have given 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Cary McGregor

customer_reviews.title: I actually was pretty impressed. All you need to assemble it is ...
customer_reviews.text: I actually was pretty impressed. All you need to assemble it is a hammer (for tapping - no pounding) and a Phillips Head screwdriver. If you follow the instructions (which are easy) and follow them exactly -- it is really simple. You need to go slow and follow the instructions EXACTLY. Do not second guess the instructions !! Even if it seems wrong to you -- the instructions are correct. The headboard is really nice for the money. Couldn't ask for more. Very impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Denny Myers

customer_reviews.title: Sauder has been good to me
customer_reviews.text: The assembly of this piece went as smooth as glass. Everything fit very neatly together and was assembled in a few hours then moved into place with help of my son. I have purchased many pieces of Sauder furniture over the years. It started with an entertainment center in the mid 80's or so. I've never had problems in assembly or in the receipt of damaged goods. One assembly I accidently dumped the bag of parts down a heater vent and had no trouble getting new parts.
customer_reviews.author: John F Foster III

customer_reviews.title: make sure there is space to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: the assembly was really easy. I wonder if I should have glued pieces as well. All the parts are there and instructions are clear. Just make sure the area is clear so attachment to the bed frame will be easier. Make note of the bolts to attach will be enough for your frame. I needed to get a longer bolt to fit but the local hardware store has them for less than a $1.
customer_reviews.author: David Kihara

customer_reviews.title: Dented corners but functional
customer_reviews.text: As far as functionality is concerned, 5/5. But it did arrive with just about every corner dented or broken. There was also another piece that clearly had a crack down the center. It was put together pretty easily, but was just really disappointed with the quality. I was here when it was delivered, and the delivery guy was kind enough to bring the box right inside, so I know it didn’t sit on an uncovered porch to get the kind of damage it had. Maybe you’ll get really great shopping people and nothing will be dented...
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Juarez

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: For the money, you can't beat this. It's beautiful and unless you look really close you couldn't tell that it doesn't cost as much as my more expensive dresser and bureau. I use 4 pillows and I have a box spring and 12" mattress it does hide the shelves somewhat but not all the way. I don't need to see them, I just need to have my stuff such as books, phone charger on them. I wouldn't want the headboard any higher. It's perfect and was very easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: A good buy, but not as expected.
customer_reviews.text: The item arrived in good condition and neatly packed. The instructions were easy to read and follow. The cam dowels that hold the sides together were cheaply made. The plastic around them split and bent when pressure was applied to the so they'd go into the hole. As a result, the sides of the headboard do not stay together very well. I'm not sure what I'm going to do about it, but returning it is not an option as it's too big and cumbersome. For the price, this item was fine. I am not pleased with it's aesthetic appearance at all, though. It's not what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not bad at all
customer_reviews.text: It looks extremely nice after assembly. Just wish the instructions were clearer, but after mulling over the booklet a few times, I pieced it together. The package itself is VERY heavy - God bless the UPS delivery person! As another review stated, it is best to take a few pieces upstairs at a time, unless you are strong enough to carry the box on your own.
customer_reviews.author: Tianna D.

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts. (Resolved)
customer_reviews.text: Unable to put together because it’s missing metal pins. I will update this rating if the parts are provided. Update: We received the replacement parts in the mail at no cost to us. This company’s customer service was excellent. This is a good product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: SupermomOf4Boys

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: We have this same headboard in another bedroom that we bought 15 years ago and seems to hold up ok, so I bought this to replace a waterbed frame that was big and heavy. The directions are terrible. the narrow top pieces kept breaking apart before we could attach the side pieces and one of the locking screws ripped out with a big chunk of particle board, The book case is almost covered by my mattress. Have some gorilla glue handy!!
customer_reviews.author: Patti Hardy

customer_reviews.title: Better than good enough
customer_reviews.text: It's above better than what you'll pay. I got this for $67 and it was well worth it. It's easy to put together. 2 hours while I was watching football. It had a few scrapes right out of the box and is very wobbly. It doesn't fit all bedframes, but I used other screws as a work around. It will last a few years. Perfect height for me.
customer_reviews.author: Guy who bought it

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Looked for a headboard that doubled as a bookcase or had shelves for pictures, books,etc. Several were quite pricey. Found this one and for the money was a great value. When put together correctly just as sturdy as more expensive ones. Also there are other pieces that match.
customer_reviews.author: terrybug61

customer_reviews.title: A good value for the money.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a bookcase headboard and this one looked nice and appeared to be a good deal for the money. My daughter put this together for me by herself and said that assembly was pretty easy. I would have liked a little more access for cords to plug item in. All in all, it was a good value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Gwen K.

customer_reviews.title: No regrets.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, great value for the money. Looks good, but the veneers are thin, so avoid doing any damage. The bottom of the boards that rest on the floor were unfinished so I attached some Teflon plastic blocks to the bottom and now I can move the bed without tearing up the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin A. Cox

customer_reviews.title: NOT Worth the Money or Aggravation!
customer_reviews.text: I’d give it zero stars if I could. Impossibly frustrating to try and assemble this...even with help. Pieces wouldn’t stay together while attempting to add other parts or tighten pieces into place. Ended up throwing it out......wasn’t going to pay any amount to return it. Save your money.....better yet, spend a little more on a QUALITY item.
customer_reviews.author: JERRY MARTIN

customer_reviews.title: very happy
customer_reviews.text: Went together well, looks nicer finished then the picture. My bed is an adjustable one and the headboard can not attach to my bed frame. Didn't give this a thought when I purchased it. However, it stands well on it's own and my mattress fits right next to it. Looks like it belongs and I am happy with it. Good price and a good headboard
customer_reviews.author: C Lenhart

customer_reviews.title: Beware falling objects
customer_reviews.text: Great headboard but I didn't think about how everything on it will come to life and start attacking you and who ever you are "jumping on the bed" with if you bolt the bed frame to the headboard. The salt stone lamp damn near killed her lol. So I just detached the frame from the headboard and it's mostly fine now lol.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Particle board with photos of Oak printed on it.
customer_reviews.text: I feel stupid, the liberal use of the word OAK and the tons of promotional material in the listing made me thik I was buying a simple oak item from an American manufacturer. This item is particle board, tacky cheap embarrassing particle board. Oh please stay in my guest room and try not to notice the particle board bed!
customer_reviews.author: BillWhopper

customer_reviews.title: Another great American made product
customer_reviews.text: We just moved in a larger home and have made many furniture purchases, the Sauder furniture has been so far the highest quality in the "assembly required" department. I love having the storage space right there for phones, books, etc. And it lined up to my new box springless frame perfectly. Assembly is not really difficult, had it done before my husband got home. USA made!
customer_reviews.author: Anna M. Boley

customer_reviews.title: the end result looks good. However
customer_reviews.text: Now that I've finished it, the end result looks good. However, it was hard to put together because once you put in the locking cams and inserted the posts, the holes in the other board were too big for the posts to fit tightly. Fortunately I had read another review prior to buying this and the guy said that he'd used Gorilla Glue each step of the way. So I used some wood glue as well, very liberally. Honestly, I wouldn't buy this piece of furniture again, though, like I said before, it looks pretty good now that I'm done. Maybe the "IKEA effect" has kicked in...
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia San Diego

customer_reviews.title: Getting what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: You're getting what you pay for. For the price, I suppose I can't really complain. Edges don't match up totally and it's not at all hefty which makes the whole headboard and bed knock around during... uh... bedroom activities. It took a while to get used to the open design- as if you're sticking your head into a bookcase. You might want to get one of those big long pillows to blockade the front when sleeping. I wish they'd notch the back vertical pieces so it could accommodate the molding at the bottom of the wall. You'd think that'd be an obvious design element.
customer_reviews.author: CTCraftBrew

customer_reviews.title: Great for small room.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for a cabin built in 1929. The room is small, so have no room for a nightstand. This headboard worked great for a queen bed. A little challenging getting it together and attaching, but very happy with the results. The light for reading, books, and kleenex now have a place. Very nice looking for inexpensive furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Luciearl

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great
customer_reviews.text: This headboard was not so hard to put together. It took me a while because I was doing it by myself in a spot that didn't have much room. Once I got it together and my bed made, it opened up some space in my room. It looks great! Just have to figure out where I want to put everything on the shelves.
customer_reviews.author: Krystal M. Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: Nice bookshelf that's easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: This came with every piece and very good instructions. Assembly took me less than an hour. The ways I wish to improve this would be to make it a few inches taller because newer beds are just ridiculously tall, and I would put lettered stickers on all wood items. Some had stickers and some had it sharpied on the unfinished side, but the wood soaked up the ink and it distorted the letters. Still, I would buy this again and I would definitely consider this company over Ikea.
customer_reviews.author: M. Lurie

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price, as advertised, and fun to put together
customer_reviews.text: Pretty easy to put together... only had to backtrack and unscrew something once. Looks great, sturdy, and useful. The cubbies are nicely sized and I really love that I can customize the shelves on either side and there are pre-cut, but not punched out, cord holes in the back of the shelves. Good purchase. Oh, and there are YouTube videos that give more info and demonstrate steps in the directions.
customer_reviews.author: LA

customer_reviews.title: Very nice piece for the price
customer_reviews.text: Very nice piece for the price. I've ordered Sauder items before and am always pleased. As with any boxed furniture, the instructions are a little confusing. It took my elderly dad and I about 2 hours to assemble it, it might have gone faster for two people that work with others better than we do. I attached it to his existing bed frame once it was assembled. For the price, you won't find a nicer headboard and the storage is quite nice. I would buy again. I dunno if I'd assemble with my dad again, tho.
customer_reviews.author: HermitsloveAmazon

customer_reviews.title: Almost a Four Star
customer_reviews.text: Once assembled, this Bookcase Headboard looks pretty good and is functional. Given that, the price was right. But it is only particle board with vaneer, so nothing to crow about. Assembly took me about three hours (working alone), as I took my time and followed the instructions carefully, exactly as pictured. As I did so, it occurred to me that perhaps a different approach might not be as awkward, but no, one gets to a couple of points where the headboard needs to have been assembled exactly as instructed in order to take the next step. So don't be tempted by your creativity -- follow the directions. I am happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: K&L

customer_reviews.title: Would not buy again
customer_reviews.text: This unit, while looking good did not assemble to be sturdy or useful. If you buy it, get some good super wood glue besides the screws and nails, in order to make it strong enough to use for any length of time. It will come apart easily if you only use the included hardware.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This kit was easy to assemble, and turned out great. It's made of particle board, so it's heavy, but even so, this 70-year-old lady had no trouble putting it together - alone. It looks nice, and the cats like the cubby space.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Book Junkie

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and quality product.
customer_reviews.text: After reading the mix of comments about assembling the backboard I was concerned, but turned out fine. I highly recommend putting it together with another person. The directions were straightforward, but baffled why they would remotely suggest not using a power drill? A hammer and power drill is all you really need and took roughly 90 minutes to assemble. Other than that it is a fine quality product for an extremely low price.
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: "Doesn't need power tools my hiney."
customer_reviews.text: This thing is the most unstable and frustrating 'build-your-own-furniture' I've ever bought from Amazon. Honestly, I would have returned it had I not realized what a piece of garbage it was BEFORE I started assembling it. It fell apart immediately when trying to move it. I had to go back in and add my own screws, nails, and bolts to add additional support just to keep it from coming apart.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Preety good for the price
customer_reviews.text: its overall a good product for the price. I was moving it one day and tried to drag it and snapped 1 of the legs. I mean it was kinda my fault its not that sturdy. but its a good buy and looks nice. SO yes I do recommend this product. I used some wood glue to get it back together and it looks nice in my guest bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Shavantee'

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: It took me about 2 hours by myself to put together this headboard and it looks great. The only issue I had is the first part where you use a couple of slotted wood pieces to hold it together before attaching the other parts. These failed and I had to manually clamp it together to finish it. I also added a touch of gorilla glue to the joints to ensure a tight sturdy fit.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: A perfect fit for a full size bed.
customer_reviews.text: Assembly - allow yourself two hours if working alone. Package was packed very good, with lots of protection. Box is heavy. Recommend taking parts out to move to bedroom. Looks great in the room with other oak furniture. Lots of small parts. Separate before starting. Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: R. Shearer

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Well made and easy to assemble. Color is perfect. Item is very study. Great directions. Took about 2 hours to put together. I was working in a limited space and I wanted to be careful and not have to take anything apart due to mistakes or damage the pieces. I highly recommend the Sauder Orchard Hills Bookcase/Headboard
customer_reviews.author: Elliot W.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: It took a while for it to get here after I placed my order. It was worth the wait. It was easy to put together. It came with great instructions. Its so nice having a headboard that has shelves.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Broyles

customer_reviews.title: Very nice unit, but poor assembly instructions
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice, attractive unit, BUT the assembly instructions are terrible. They are nicely detailed and precise, but ass-backward, causing you to be in almost impossible situations that would be much easier in a different sequence and positioning, and putting what should be one of the last steps in step 1, which also endangers the integrity of some of the parts. Being experienced in assembling similar items, I should have read more carefully and I would probably have seen the illogical sequence. I recommend anyone to buy this, BUT try to spot the goofy instructions. If you're recently experienced, you'll likely see it right away.
customer_reviews.author: Lamplighter

customer_reviews.title: Sauder is and has been always a reliable product and ...
customer_reviews.text: Sauder is and has been always a reliable product and this purchase was no expectation. I CAUTION you to READ the directions carefully and DO NOT jump ahead or think you know how to do this 'cause you've put together many other items. You must follow the order outlined... precisely! This item was very well packed to reduce or prevent chipping! It shows Sauder listened to previous concerns on this. THANK YOU SAUDER
customer_reviews.author: Adele Vogel

customer_reviews.title: Great but def sized for queen bed
customer_reviews.text: Loved everything about it, but it’s really a queen. I have a full bed and the ends sticking out on either side are obvious. But I’m ok with that myself. Just be warned this is for a queen.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: I was very pleased with this item
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased with this item. The instructions were very good and it is easy to assemble. I was happy with the quality and look as well, it is a printed finish and not at all textured but looks very nice. Don't get these types of pressboard fake wood items wet though it will swell where it was wet and never go back flat again and look bad. I have bought other Sauder products over the years and always been pleased with them. Yes it is 6" too wide for a Full size bed, but thankfully I have a bed skirt on it which hides that fact fairly well.
customer_reviews.author: AStr01

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Fits with my furniture perfectly. I will be able to keep my books and remote off my nightstand where they were always being knocked off. There is nothing to dislike and was well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret KIng

customer_reviews.title: Particle Board as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Inexpensive solution for not having enough room in the bedroom for end tables. Adjustable bed frame brackets can be forced to fit Queen frame. Wood product is classic particle board. Instructions are easy to follow and assembly is as expected. Since I'm single an out of my prime the bedroom doesn't get much action so this little shelf/case/rack should last long enough. Arrived surprisingly fast (chose free shipping and got it in three days). Arrived with a small corner of the particle board missing but hardly noticeable.
customer_reviews.author: Frest0n

customer_reviews.title: Purchased 2
customer_reviews.text: Although they aren't real wood, they look nice, match our other furniture and we like them a lot! They don't look cheap when put together. We needed the storage in the headboard for our many items.
customer_reviews.author: Kaysette

customer_reviews.title: Decent Quality & Great Value
customer_reviews.text: For 86 bucks and change this bookcase headboard cannot be beat from a quality for the money perspective. Yes the loaded box that arrives is a bit heavy, and yes, you will need an hour or two to put it together, but you just cannot beat the value equation of this item. Highly recommend if you don't mind spending the time to put it together.
customer_reviews.author: Razzierb

customer_reviews.title: Not made for full size bed....to big.
customer_reviews.text: This is strictly a queen headboard. Does not fit a full size after we put it all together. Huge gaps where the headboard attached to the bed and no way to adjust.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great piece of furniture for the price
customer_reviews.text: We order this for our son. It's not wood, but wood product and the instructions are very confusing. My husband was able to put it together and it looks great and it's pretty sturdy. However the was a piece of the headboard missing. The top piece that frames the opening. I did contact the manufacture and they sent the missing piece within a week. The piece does not match the color of the furniture perfectly. It is a few shades off, but because of how it fits it's not very obvious. I am please with the purchase and the response of the manufacturing company.
customer_reviews.author: Susan J Forbes

customer_reviews.title: this makes a very nice and sturdy headboard
customer_reviews.text: IF you follow directions very carefully AND use glue on every single possible screw and joint and square up everything carefully and use a rubber mallet to tighten fittings, this makes a very nice and sturdy headboard. The precision with which a couple of cuts are made is just a litttle short of what they should be.
customer_reviews.author: J. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: A good workout!!
customer_reviews.text: Very well-packed, no damage to contents. Took me about 4.5 hours to put it together, by my self. I am 5.2 ",female,but I got it together by myself. But I know I worked because muscles I knew about (and didn't know about) hurt!!! But it looks great. I did not rush it cause if I do that I put something on backwards or upside down, etc... But I took my time and went through instructions carefully and it turned out very nicely!! Would recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: S. J. Guile

customer_reviews.title: ASSEMBLY NIGHTMARE
customer_reviews.text: Much more trouble than it's worth. The isometric drawings are infantile, making IKEA assembly instructions look like MIT engineering drawings. Chances of the cheap particle board breaking and chipping is high due to the awkward assembly process. After FIVE frustrating hours, I threw the whole thing in the trash. Maybe a high priced carpenter could assemble this mess.
customer_reviews.author: Viewer Pro

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality for the price.
customer_reviews.text: First off, yes, it's laminated particle board, but at this price, you're not getting real wood. That said, it's a solid piece, well-constructed and sturdy. Fairly easy for one person to put together. I rather wish the top front edges had been made flush (rather than the slight overhang that exists), but that was a design choice, not a manufacturing flaw, so I won't take any stars for it. Overall, I'm very satisfied with this piece.
customer_reviews.author: G. Wright

customer_reviews.title: Looks ok but mine has some edge damage
customer_reviews.text: Looks better than the picture. All hardware including the frame attachment bolts are included. Assembly went pretty smooth until I had to attach the back cardboard piece. It was a PITA. Edge damage + PITA assembly = 4 stars
customer_reviews.author: BruceG

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic value for money, really ties a nook together
customer_reviews.text: The shelves are solid and completely optional installs, I personally like just having three large cubbies. The finish on the exterior sides are high quality and can really tie a room together, the dark color just make it look so cozy under warm lighting
customer_reviews.author: Devin R.

customer_reviews.title: great!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for about two years. Assembly was easy, if slightly time-consuming (which is unavoidable if you want this many shelves). I love having the extra storage space so accessible from my bed! Have had no problems with it at all.
customer_reviews.author: dancergirl

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Bookcase came undamaged...That's a positive... It is very heavy around 70 lbs or more? Not real wood but Particle Board..But looks OK to me. The only thing I'd say is you may need help when trying to mate the ends to the center support frame. It's hard to hold and Aline the four pins to each side. I had help to do this step. Everything else wen't well.... And looks good too and it was one of the cheaper ones I saw.
customer_reviews.author: Lamar J. Danner

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time. Ordered it for my grandson's double bed but he already had one....so my daughter used it for her queen and it fit perfectly. Looks nice. It's a piece of Sauder furniture and not too hard to put together.
customer_reviews.author: C. Charles

customer_reviews.title: It's okay
customer_reviews.text: It does what it's supposed to... be a headboard with shelves. It's actually easier to put together if you DON'T read the instructions. It's pretty self-explanatory, but the directions are vague and seem confusing. Use them as a reference for parts only, not actual assembly. It's not quite wide enough for my queen size bed, and puts a little strain on the frame of the headboard. Like I said, it serves it's purpose. It is not the highest quality, but it's relatively solid, and you get a decent product for a decent price. Not a bad purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Peter O

customer_reviews.title: A Good Value For a Quality Headboard
customer_reviews.text: This arrived extremely well packed. No missing parts and none were damaged. It was a large heavy package that was a challenge to move from my front door to a nearby room to open and check out the parts. It took about an hour and a half to assemble and the instructions were clear and accurate. The resulting headboard looks to be a high quality one with nice features. Recommended if you are looking for a good value.
customer_reviews.author: G. Sargent

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: This is a decent piece of furniture and was pretty easy to put together. Is it solid wood? no but it doesn't cost as much either. It works very nicely for the guest room and it is getting harder and harder to find bookcase style headboards.
customer_reviews.author: Chief

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorite Amazon purchases!
customer_reviews.text: So worth the money! It was relatively easy for my friend and I to put it together—took us about 35 min. Instructions are clear and the final product is solid, and feels well-made! Just be sure to keep coasters around If you’re going to be using cups!
customer_reviews.author: Nicki N.

customer_reviews.title: Happy with this headboard
customer_reviews.text: I am pleased with this purchase. It is sturdy piece of furniture once it's assembled. There were other similar looking headboards available, but for the price, this was certainly the best deal.
customer_reviews.author: _Beth_

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking but hard to put together and I used to buy IKEA a lot and never had problems.
customer_reviews.text: Very hard to put together by yourself, even though the instructions are pretty clear. I did have a coupe of pieces break while putting together becuase of angles it had to be on. It is a nice looking piece once done and I needed it for a adjustable bed and just screwed it into my wall after
customer_reviews.author: Mitch

customer_reviews.title: There were some damage on the corners of some boards ...
customer_reviews.text: There were some damage on the corners of some boards, but not enough to warrant a refund/return. The directions for assembly could be more detailed as they do leave out some parts. Took about 1 hour assembly with an electric drill - but be careful when you use these as you don't want to over-power through the particle board.
customer_reviews.author: Blane Kile

customer_reviews.title: Nice Storage
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this and 2 night stands for storage in our living room. With a bit of tweaking, it turned out pretty nice.
customer_reviews.author: Deb G

customer_reviews.title: Queen, not full
customer_reviews.text: This isn’t a full/ queen headboard. It is absolutely a queen. Overhangs too much on the full frame. Doesn’t boot firmly to the frame and also needs to be secured to the wall
customer_reviews.author: DanT

customer_reviews.title: Good headboard at a decent price
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our daughters bedroom. We didn't want to spend a fortune but still wanted something that looked nice. My wife and I are happy with this purchase. Two of the pieces had crush marks on them when we received it. We called Sauder, they sent out replacement parts quickly - great customer service! I put the headboard together in about an hour. My daughter has a full-size bed. There is a bit of a gap on each side, but it works well enough.
customer_reviews.author: Steakman

customer_reviews.title: It is a revolution in the commercialization of heavy commodity like queen to king size beds which was once unthinkable
customer_reviews.text: Exceptionally well built both functionally and cosmetically with very competitive pricing. The bed surprisingly regains its handsome shape after a couple of days out of the cardboard box! It is a revolution in the commercialization of heavy commodity like queen to king size beds which was once unthinkable. The quality conveniently competes with those much highly priced beds. It does not look cheapo at all ! In fact it looks like worth much more. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: eastcastle007

customer_reviews.title: 1.5 hours to get assembled myself but it looks good in my guest room
customer_reviews.text: It took me 1.5 hours to get assembled myself but it looks good in my guest room. There is a small part where the "wood finish" is a little damages but it's not very noticeable and I didn't notice until I was an hour into assembly so it's going to stay. Overall I'm happy with my purchase for the guest bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: MberAnn

customer_reviews.title: As Advertised - no frill, storage headboard
customer_reviews.text: Pros: 1. Sturdy wood 2. Sturdy parts 3. Bins are large and functional -gives you just enough storage 4. The oak veneer matches my real oak furniture 5. There are punch outs for cables in the back cardboard panel Cons 1. I felt this was difficult to put together. Definitely a two-person job. It is VERY heavy - hope you have someone to help you carry it. 2. I wish the cubbies had doors
customer_reviews.author: AmazonPurchases

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: This is a good looking yet sturdy piece of furniture! Directions were a little challenging tho but it’s done and looks great. Excellent value imo
customer_reviews.author: Pat Buehrle

customer_reviews.title: Arrived wood shipped - flimsy!
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed! Wood damaged, holes for pegs not aligned, needs two people to put together, one has to hold pieces to align. Very flimsy, not stable - badly built!! I would return it if I didn't have to repack and take to UPS. Very heavy, couldn't be bothered and took the loss instead. Don't purchase the product unless you are willing to do extra work on this!
customer_reviews.author: Sybillia

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I will give it a 3. Very sturdy but several of the pieces were cosmeticly damaged. Now I have to buy some wood repair markets... Easy to put together with 2 people
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Was hoping for better quality.
customer_reviews.text: Heavy box and boards but it came scratched and chipped in very visible areas. Not hard to assemble, easy to follow instructions, seems sturdy so far. Appeared much lighter colored in the pictures so it doesnt match my dressers. I would have returned it but I already had it assembled which took almost 45 minutes and the box was damaged in shipping.
customer_reviews.author: kallensr

customer_reviews.title: Great headboard
customer_reviews.text: This headboard was really easy to assemble, I did it by myself while my husband was at work. We bought this to put on our spare bed. Very sturdy, not cheap quality, and worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: SaraB

customer_reviews.title: Put together by myself at 71 yo and love it!
customer_reviews.text: It felt daunting doing this by myself but I did it and so is definitely possible. All parts were included with clear instructions. It looks great, sturdy, and nice wood. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lizlo

customer_reviews.title: I love this Carolina Oak finish from Sauder
customer_reviews.text: This was a little hard for me only because I was doing it alone and the size was awkward to maneuver in a small space. But it fits right in with the rest of my bedroom, living room and office furniture. I love this Carolina Oak finish from Sauder.
customer_reviews.author: Noonie Fortin

customer_reviews.title: Can assemble by self
customer_reviews.text: Nice, simple headboard. Initially a little confusing to assemble, but I was able to do it by myself. Fit nicely on my wire mattress frame.
customer_reviews.author: KMS

customer_reviews.title: good for the price with some annoyances
customer_reviews.text: Well it's good for the price. easy to set up. it's the first headboard I bought for myself since I moved out. I have a few problems with it so far though. if I were to put my bed on a frame and attach it to the headboard, my bed would then almost cover the shelves and block cute decorations. also, if it's against the wall, doing "fun things" in bed is hard because the headboard will rock and bang against the wall and possibly cause wall damage. I'm thinking of getting a thick blanket and pinning it up behind the headboard to alleviate the noise and wall damage caused by my ... intimate moments.
customer_reviews.author: Alysse

customer_reviews.title: Mistake in Purchase; Satisfaction in Return
customer_reviews.text: Oh, this was not a good purchase. By the time I got some of the parts together, they all popped out again, leaving big ugly openings and holes. Some major screws did not match screw holes. I'm in the process of sending it back. On a great note, returning it has been very painless and I couldn't ask for better customer satisfaction.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Cartwright

customer_reviews.title: Helpful addition to our bedroom
customer_reviews.text: We were looking for an inexpensive headboard for our guestroom that would not take up much limited space and would be sturdy, attractive and allow us to eliminate the need for a side table. This piece did all of the above. I assembled on our living room floor while watching a basketball game and then moved the assembled item into the bedroom without any problem. We decided to attach it to the frame since we (ok, so my wife) can still make up the bed rather easily. That also gave it more stability. Satisfied customer!
customer_reviews.author: David Nichols

customer_reviews.title: Nice headboard!
customer_reviews.text: I am pleasantly surprised by this headboard. It was easy to put together well my husband did most of the work but it looks really nice for the price .
customer_reviews.author: diana spanu

customer_reviews.title: OK Quality and Nice Looking
customer_reviews.text: The bed looks good. I think it is a bit too flimsy and it is made of particle board. I don't know how long it will last given my daughter uses it for college and will be moving it from time to time.
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the money!
customer_reviews.text: I thought the instructions were clear. It is sturdy and will be useful. My stepson likes the small shelves for his phone and Alexa Dot. The hardware was of good quality as well. It mated perfectly to a queen bed frame.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Came together quickly and looks perfect
customer_reviews.text: I was able to build it alone in a little over an hour. The directions are very well done, and even have a couple jokes to keep you motivated. It looks elegant and its pretty heavy and feels solid.
customer_reviews.author: Vivian

customer_reviews.title: Just one glitch.
customer_reviews.text: Make sure two healthy people assemble this. It's very heavy. Once assembled, it looks great and it's sturdy. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: ROY L. COVER

customer_reviews.title: Hard to assemble
customer_reviews.text: This was terribly difficult to put together. Too many pieces. It’s hard to hold it steady to fit adjoining parts. I ended up throwing it away because we wore some holes too wide innthe pressed board wood because it kept falling awkwardly. I was so done with this.,after asking two others to help. We decided to throw it away and purchase another headboard.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Great, for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what I had intended it for, not difficult to put together, sturdy for the materials.
customer_reviews.author: Don Lucius

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Came slightly damaged is torn box. Not to hard to assemble. Some images and parts difficult to see. Final product looks pretty good
customer_reviews.author: nhisim

customer_reviews.title: As pictured. Serves it's purpose. Not particularly well protected package-shipping-wise.
customer_reviews.text: It looks exactly like the product pictured. Unfortunately, it came damaged. I didn't report it because its a big hassle and my mother is the one who wanted this ASAP. Well, it got here ASAP but damaged. I believe it was carrier, but who knows.
customer_reviews.author: KRA

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: Instructions were a little difficult to read but overall, I assembled in 3.5 hours
customer_reviews.author: Scott Taylor

product_meta.title: Sauder Orchard Hills Full/Queen Bookcase Headboard, Carolina Oak finish
product_meta.description: Add a touch of traditional style and elegance to your bedroom décor with this full/queen bookcase headboard from the Orchard Hills collection. This handsome bookshelf headboard easily attaches to a full or queen size bed frame to give your bedroom a polished look. Its bookcase shelf provides a spacious area to store and display bedtime books, your alarm clock, and other nighttime necessities. Finished in a classic Carolina Oak, it also features cord access through the enclosed back panel. Dress up your bed with a bookcase headboard today.
feature_bullets: Attaches to full or queen size bed
Spacious display area for alarm clock and books
Enclosed back panel has cord access

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars713 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
